workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.46101017959847307 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.3935040804923406 --weight-decay 0.0009893778613234573 --lr 0.0009184647280870591 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 76816 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.017573125690985902 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
